title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.19 - Window view obstruction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.19 - Window view obstruction

State Regulations

The use or placing of posters, stickers, signs or other
objects on the windshield and/or windows of an automotive vehicle or piece of
mobile equipment owned or operated by the authority, its tenants and
concessionaires other than those authorized by the authority is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
